attributes.action: Install a Technocratic Government in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls upon the House of Commons to dissolve Parliament, and replace it with a Technocratic system of Governance, akin to the provisional Governments seen in Greece and Italy, under Lucas Papademos and Mario Monti respectively.

This system will ensure that the executive branch is headed by competent professionals and experts, as opposed to the out-of-touch career politicians we find ourselves afflicted with today.
